Coding Fest 2021 will be held in a hybrid mode at 10am-2pm on Wed 9th June in the PNR (Peter Nicol Russel) building at the University of Sydney.

PNR Lecture Theatre 1 (LT1) PNR Drawing Office 311, 315, 316
08:00am – 09:30am Steup
9:30am Check in
10:00am – 10:30am Tutorial
Start Coding without Hesitation - Programming Languages Showdown
Jianzhou Zhao, Anastasios Papaioannou (Sydney Informatics Hub) 		Project Showcase
Refer to the list of Showcase Projects below.
10:30am – 11:00am Project Showcase
Refer to the list of Showcase Projects below.
11:00am – 11:30am Tech Talk 1
Augmented Reality with HoloLens
Lawrence Crumpton (Microsoft)
11:30am – 12:00pm Tech Talk 2
So what's the deal with Cloud?
Nicholas Tucker (Accenture)
12:00pm – 12:30pm Award Presentation
12:30pm – 14:00pm Free Lunch and Networking
